name: Indyeva Riga II Turtleneck - Women's
description:
Great movement, in an easy, soft fabric that wicks and disperses moisture quickly. Shaped edges and curved seams give it a signature modern look.Polyester, lyocell and spandex knit has a comfortable 4-way stretch and dries quickly.Thermo Balance drirelease® lyocell wicks away moisture.FreshGuard® finish prevents odours.Ruching on left seam.Shaped hem and cuffs.Centre back length is 27in.

        Sustainability
